gstreamer-record-h264: caps="application/x-rtp, media=(string)video, clock-rate=(int)90000, encoding-name=(string)H264, payload=(int)96" ! rtph264depay ! h264parse ! tee name=t t. ! queue ! flvmux ! filesink location=
t. ! queue leaky=1 ! decodebin ! videoconvert ! appsink
gstreamer-display-h264: caps="application/x-rtp, media=(string)video, clock-rate=(int)90000, encoding-name=(string)H264" ! rtph264depay ! avdec_h264 ! videoconvert ! appsink
gstreamer-record-jpeg: caps="application/x-rtp, media=(string)video, clock-rate=(int)90000, encoding-name=(string)JPEG, payload=(int)26" ! rtpjpegdepay ! jpegdec ! x264enc ! h264parse ! tee name=t t. ! queue ! flvmux ! filesink location=
t. ! queue leaky=1 ! decodebin ! videoconvert ! appsink
gstreamer-display-jpeg: caps="application/x-rtp, media=(string)video, encoding-name=(string)JPEG" ! rtpjpegdepay ! decodebin ! videoconvert ! appsink
